Statement.Sql: select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort from FIELD_VALUE v, FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=g.mFieldId and mKey=? order by v.mCreated desc
select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort from FIELD_VALUE v, FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=g.mFieldId and mKey=? and v.mFieldId=? order by v.mCreated desc
